entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:58 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 10:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: NNE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning late in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
